line.originaltext: 1 cup olive oil
1/3 cup distilled white vinegar
1/2 cup white sugar
1 (3 ounce) package chicken flavored ramen noodles, crushed, seasoning packet reserved
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "1 (3 ounce) package chicken flavored ramen noodles, crushed, seasoning packet reserved")

line.originaltext: 1 large head fresh broccoli, diced
line.annotation: create_ing(ing4, "1 large head fresh broccoli, diced")

line.originaltext: 2 carrots, grated
2 bunches green onions, chopped
1 cup sunflower seeds
In a small bowl combine oil, vinegar, sugar and the seasoning packet from the ramen noodles.
In a small bowl combine oil, vinegar, sugar and the seasoning packet from the ramen noodles.
In a small bowl combine oil, vinegar, sugar and the seasoning packet from the ramen noodles.
In a small bowl combine oil, vinegar, sugar and the seasoning packet from the ramen noodles.
Mix well and refrigerate at least one hour before serving, or overnight.
Mix well and refrigerate at least one hour before serving, or overnight.
In a large bowl combine broccoli, carrots, green onions and sunflower seeds.
In a large bowl combine broccoli, carrots, green onions and sunflower seeds.
line.annotation: combine({ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7}, ing12, "broccoli mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl combine broccoli, carrots, green onions and sunflower seeds.
Crush ramen noodles and stir in.
Crush ramen noodles and stir in.
Pour dressing over salad about 10 minutes before serving.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing14}, ing15, "final salad", "pour dressing over salad")

line.originaltext: Pour dressing over salad about 10 minutes before serving.
